attributes.action: reintroduce car tax for vehicles manufactured before 1973
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As you aware new vehicles are taxed on CO2 emissions. The higher the emission the more you pay to tax. It is a known fact that older cars create far more CO2 as they are using older more uneconomical engines. 

It is therefore imperative that owners of these cars are forced to pay the maximum tax bracket that is enforce today.

Why punish those that have economical cars and not those with gas guzzling old cars.
